cast.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
cast.title: The Matrix

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Marcus Scott Chong (born July 8, 1967) is an American actor. He is known for playing Miguel Mendez in the short-lived crime drama, Street Justice (1991–1993), real-life activist Huey P. Newton in Panther (1995), directed by Mario Van Peebles, and most notably, Tank in The Matrix (1999), directed by The Wachowskis.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Marcus Chong, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Marcus Chong
